entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
